title: Tabs
description: The Tabs component provides a customizable and smooth tab navigation system, supporting multiple sizes and theme-aware applications, perfect for modern UIs with light and dark modes.

body.raw:
# Tabs Component Documentation The **Tabs** component is a customizable tab system that supports multiple sizes and provides a smooth transition effect. It is designed for modern, theme-aware applications that use CSS variables (defined in your global CSS) for light and dark modes. ## Preview and Code Snippet console.log("Tab clicked:", value)}> Preview Code Account Password

Account Settings

Manage your account settings and preferences.

Password Settings

Change your password and security settings.

 ```tsx import { Tabs, TabsContent, TabsList, Tab } from "@/components/tabs"; export default function Example() { return ( Account Password

Account Settings

Manage your account settings and preferences.

Password Settings

Change your password and security settings.

 ); } ``` ## Props | Prop | Type | Default | Description | | --------------- | -------------------------------------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------- | | `defaultValue` | `string` | `""` | The initial active tab when the component mounts. | | `value` | `string` | `""` | The controlled value of the active tab. | | `onValueChange` | `(value: string) => void` | `undefined` | Callback function when the active tab changes. | | `onTabClick` | `(value: string) => void` | `undefined` | Callback function when a tab is clicked. | | `size` | `"xs" \| "sm" \| "md" \| "lg" \| "xl"` | `"md"` | Controls the size of the tab buttons. | | `...props` | `React.HTMLAttributes` | â€“ | Supports all standard `div` attributes. |
